events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain is facing challenges due to the exponential growth in EV markets, which pressures the supply chains and relies on critical mineral extraction and refining processes.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain is facing challenges due to the exponential growth in EV markets, which pressures the supply chains and relies on critical mineral extraction and refining processes.

events.name: Demand for batteries
events.wd_description: The surge in demand for batteries is increasing pressure on the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: The surge in demand for batteries is increasing pressure on the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: tical mineral extraction
events.wd_description: The extraction of critical minerals is essential for battery production, impacting the supply chain.
events.description: The extraction of critical minerals is essential for battery production, impacting the supply chain.

events.name: ining processes
events.wd_description: Refining processes are crucial for preparing extracted minerals for battery production.
events.description: Refining processes are crucial for preparing extracted minerals for battery production.

events.name: Environmental and social impacts
events.wd_description: The extraction and refining of critical minerals have significant environmental and social impacts.
events.description: The extraction and refining of critical minerals have significant environmental and social impacts.

events.name: Geopolitical vulnerabilities
events.wd_description: The global spread of extraction and refining operations exposes the supply chain to geopolitical risks.
events.description: The global spread of extraction and refining operations exposes the supply chain to geopolitical risks.

events.name: Policy and technology solutions
events.wd_description: Early-stage policy and technology solutions aim to improve mining practices and develop circular economies for critical minerals.
events.description: Early-stage policy and technology solutions aim to improve mining practices and develop circular economies for critical minerals.

events.name: ing practices
events.wd_description: Policies focus on improving mining practices to reduce environmental and social impacts.
events.description: Policies focus on improving mining practices to reduce environmental and social impacts.

events.name: cular economies
events.wd_description: Developing circular economies for critical minerals to enhance sustainability in the supply chain.
events.description: Developing circular economies for critical minerals to enhance sustainability in the supply chain.

events.name: Policymaking
events.wd_description: EV supply chains are a significant focus of policymaking efforts to build resilience through diversification and promote battery tracing, reusing, and recycling.
events.description: EV supply chains are a significant focus of policymaking efforts to build resilience through diversification and promote battery tracing, reusing, and recycling.

events.name: estic policies
events.wd_description: U.S. policies aim to strengthen supply chains and promote domestic manufacturing of EV batteries.
events.description: U.S. policies aim to strengthen supply chains and promote domestic manufacturing of EV batteries.

events.name: tructure Investment and Jobs Act
events.wd_description: This act allocated funding for critical minerals mining, processing, and research activities.
events.description: This act allocated funding for critical minerals mining, processing, and research activities.

events.name: e Production Act
events.wd_description: The act was invoked to encourage domestic battery investment and reduce dependence on imports.
events.description: The act was invoked to encourage domestic battery investment and reduce dependence on imports.

events.name: ion Reduction Act
events.wd_description: Expanded and redefined EV purchase credits to require a percentage of minerals in U.S.-made EV batteries to be sourced domestically or from free trade agreement countries.
events.description: Expanded and redefined EV purchase credits to require a percentage of minerals in U.S.-made EV batteries to be sourced domestically or from free trade agreement countries.

events.name: ernational policies
events.wd_description: Policies aimed at global collaboration and diversification to build resilient EV battery supply chains.
events.description: Policies aimed at global collaboration and diversification to build resilient EV battery supply chains.

events.name: Reducing critical mineral demand
events.wd_description: Strategies to reduce the demand for critical minerals in EV batteries, including new battery technologies and recycling.
events.description: Strategies to reduce the demand for critical minerals in EV batteries, including new battery technologies and recycling.

events.name: Low-mineral battery technologies
events.wd_description: Developing new battery technologies that require fewer critical minerals.
events.description: Developing new battery technologies that require fewer critical minerals.

events.name: Battery recycling
events.wd_description: Progress in recycling and recovering critical minerals from used batteries.
events.description: Progress in recycling and recovering critical minerals from used batteries.

events.name: Mitigating vehicle demand
events.wd_description: Reducing car dependency through improved land use, transit, and mobility options.
events.description: Reducing car dependency through improved land use, transit, and mobility options.

events.name: Expanding the supply chain
events.wd_description: The expansion of the EV battery supply chain, involving the development of new refining facilities and mines.
events.description: The expansion of the EV battery supply chain, involving the development of new refining facilities and mines.

events.name: Lead time for facilities
events.wd_description: The time required to develop new refining facilities for EV battery production.
events.description: The time required to develop new refining facilities for EV battery production.

events.name: Lead time for mines
events.wd_description: The time required to establish new mines, including delays due to community and environmental challenges.
events.description: The time required to establish new mines, including delays due to community and environmental challenges.

events.name: Community and environmental considerations
events.wd_description: Addressing community and environmental harms in initial mining proposals to reduce delays.
events.description: Addressing community and environmental harms in initial mining proposals to reduce delays.

events.name: Sustainable growth
events.description: This event refers to the need for EV supply chains to grow in a sustainable, just, and low-carbon manner.

events.name: Diversification
events.description: This event highlights efforts to build supply chain resilience through diversification and the promotion of tools for tracing, reusing, and recycling EV batteries.

events.name: Battery right sizing
events.description: This event involves ensuring that batteries are appropriately sized and technology is improved to reduce critical mineral demand.

events.name: Improved land use
events.description: This event captures strategies for mitigating vehicle demand by improving land use.

events.name: Increased transit and mobility options
events.description: This event reflects efforts to reduce car dependency by increasing transit and mobility options.

events.name: Robust application processes
events.description: This event emphasizes the importance of well-designed and well-communicated application processes for reducing lead times and ensuring low-harm mining proposals.
